RoleSpecification.description: A RoleSpecification represents a specification of a role, which may be defined in the context of a given type of partnership (PartnershipSpecification), such as Buyer, Seller.

description.description: An explanatory text documenting the role specification

name.description: The name of the role specification. This name uniquely identifies the role specification within the partnership

requiresBilling.description: Indicates whether billing operations will be associated to parties playing the role

requiresSettlement.description: Indicates whether settlement operations will be associated to parties playing the role
